Package org.odpi.openmetadata.viewservices.glossarybrowser.admin

Class GlossaryBrowserAdmin

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.openmetadata.adminservices.registration.ViewServiceAdmin
org.odpi.openmetadata.viewservices.glossarybrowser.admin.GlossaryBrowserAdmin
public class GlossaryBrowserAdmin extends ViewServiceAdmin
GlossaryBrowserAdmin is the class that is called by the View Server to initialize and terminate the Glossary Browser OMVS. The initialization call provides this OMVS with the Audit log and configuration.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(String serverName, ViewServiceConfig viewServiceConfig, AuditLog auditLog, String serverUserName, int maxPageSize) throws OMAGConfigurationErrorException
      Initialize the Glossary Browser view service.
      Specified by:
      initialize in class ViewServiceAdmin
      Parameters:
      serverName - name of the local server
      viewServiceConfig - specific configuration properties for this view service.
      auditLog - audit log component for logging messages.
      serverUserName - user id to use to issue calls to the remote server.
      maxPageSize - maximum page size. 0 means unlimited
      Throws:
      OMAGConfigurationErrorException - invalid parameters in the configuration properties.
